meanings.definition: A type of Chinese noodle dish.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious honan at the new restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes honan for dinner every Friday.
meanings.sent3: The honan jumped out of the bowl and started dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as long and curly as a bowl of honan.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the steaming honan filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Have you ever visited Honan during your travels?
meanings.sent2: The bustling streets of Honan are always crowded with people.
meanings.sent3: In Honan, even the pigeons wear tiny hats!
meanings.sent4: His heart was a map with Honan at its center.
meanings.sent5: The lights of Honan twinkled like stars in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Honan is our new neighbor down the street.
meanings.sent2: The Honan family has been living here for generations.
meanings.sent3: The Honan clan gathered for a grand reunion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the Honan family name.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of the Honan surname is one of honor and respect.
